text: Surfboard makes it delightfully easy to craft onboarding experiences.
You provide an array of panels and surfboard figures out the rest.
You can create panels in code, or with JSON.
Each panel contain text, an image, and optionally, a button.
The contents of each panel are tinted to a color that you provide.
When a user taps on the optional button, you recieve a delegate callback to handle it.
See the documentation on GitHub for more information.
